website_summaries.verdict: This workbench stores away against a wall and can be quickly reassembled into a nearly full-size woodworking table, with sturdy clamps that make joining a breeze.
pros: Lightweight at 20 pounds, yet incredibly sturdy thanks to its four reinforced legs
Holds up to 1000 pounds without a problem
Includes 4 holding clamps and has a small storage drawer for accessories
Easy to assemble and disassemble, with a carrying handle for toting
cons: May not accept mounted power tools like routers

customer_reviews.title: Cracked leg support
customer_reviews.text: My one arrived with a cracked leg support (see image) I’m not sure if this will make a difference in the long term as I’ve not used this item yet, but it does worry me. A company’s workmanship is reflected in their ability to do quality control. Even if day this crack doesn’t make a difference in the overall function of the table, cosmetic negligence reflects overall quality. That being said, I will update with function quality once I’ve actually put a huge heavy saw on top.
customer_reviews.author: Russell-san

customer_reviews.title: honest review: pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: pros: light weight, easy to carry cons: it claims 1000 lb, it's a joke...... I'm only 150 lbs, when I sit on it, it wobbles a lot !!! Be aware folks, safety first !!!
customer_reviews.author: Qing Mu

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: More stable than the other. Clamps are difficult until you break them in. Be rough, it will glide smooth. Nice that the clamps will turn to where you need them. Sits a little higher than the other. Nice solid work table with clamps. Worth the money. Lightweight and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above does not meet Amazons High Standards!!
customer_reviews.text: received with broken leg retainer clip!! When 2nd box was opened the clip(at bottom of table fell from shipping container...). It is functional except when taking down and storing... Advise JR???? The clip holds the leg in its proper storage location... Received as damaged merchandise!! JR
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ries

customer_reviews.title: Folding table you say?
customer_reviews.text: Title says "Folding Table". I would not necessarily call this a folding table, maybe a stow away table or something would be more accurate. Reason being is that the legs are secured into the base, you have to remove them and insert them into the table and turn them about a half turn to lock them in. After, remove legs and place them back into their location. Not a HUGE deal but I was expecting it to simply unfold and then fold up. The plus side is that it is very well made and sturdy. It is relatively light and the handle is well balanced and makes it easy to carry. Good table for the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dad

customer_reviews.title: Keter Jobmate
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and very sturdy. I prefer the twist-lock legs (this has) over the folding ones. Perfect for draining the oil on my mower and edger and all my woodworking projects..
customer_reviews.author: David Planchon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Great in every way. Works perfect for a portable workbench and table. East to put together and East to store.
customer_reviews.author: TRW

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It pretty much is exactly like the description no complaints at all. It actually folds up better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this portable work bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this work table, I use it with my mitre saw this is a solid work bench. Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product design and value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed high quality product, far exceeding my expectations given the price. It is very easy to setup, and the slots for the bar clamps work great. I found that 4" Jorgensen clamps can fit in the included storage box. I especially appreciate the minimal amount of sharp molded edges. Kudos to the industrial designers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Zilber

customer_reviews.title: Very light and portable
customer_reviews.text: It is light and portable. Takes less than minute to put the legs together and ready for use. The clamps that came with it is not that useful on the other hand but over all this work table does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mhetz

customer_reviews.title: Light, Sturdy & Outstanding Quality Workbench
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was simply amazed at how well built and sturdy this workbench is for how light and low priced it is. Fit and finish is excellent, the legs are solid, and the clamps that come with it are very good for clamping horizontally. You can add a couple of standard 2" bar clamps that will slide into the aluminum rails for clamping vertically. One of the best tool/workshop related purchases I've ever made. Don't write reviews very often but was so pleased with this, felt I had to.
customer_reviews.author: AvidTXAngler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bench except for clamps
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, great storage of legs and clamps but clamps are all but useless. I am glad I bought it for the workspace, cutting lumber, but the clamps just don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: After using this workbench for almost a month, I can say that this product overall deserves the rating I have given. The bench has great stability, amazing quality, and has easy assembly, and disassembly. It is great for woodworking projects and the clamps do a good job of holding the wood in place. Just may be my first and last workbench!
customer_reviews.author: Vexoal

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my new table 💖😊🙌🙌🙌🙌🙌🎉👍💪
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this table, is so practical easy to put together, it literally takes me less than a minute to put it up and take it down, very light and fits just about anywhere, and it takes a lot of weight, best gift I have given myself in a while, totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Luis

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Table Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these, two without the slots. I prefer the one without the clamping slots, but you can’t buy that one anymore. I use it as a portable work table for my business. Love the containers at one end for hold screws and small parts. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dogbarczar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great table haven't used it yet but I know it's gonna work great. Probably gonna order a second one. Takes less then a minute to set up and the clamps provided work great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Roth

customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It is easy to set up. The issues I have is that the clamps don't go the whole width of the table and they are hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert and Sharilyn V.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This work table is very sturdy-holds my compound mitre saw nicely. I needed to do some creative clamping to get the saw to stay in place but once I got that accomplished I’ve been very pleased with the work table.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Felts

customer_reviews.title: Decent worktable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Could be sturdier and the thickness prevents clamps from being used in some places. But overall its a good table especially because the materials are cant rust or corrode.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Vermani

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Sturdy and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Decent work bench. I used it only once but I like how sturdy it feels and how easy it is to pack it away when done.
customer_reviews.author: Arman Mnatsakanyan

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually used it yet, but I did set it up which was easy, and the table seems very stable.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on every project that I worked on. It includes the table locks and a smaller toolbox on the bottom of the table, you can store a ruler, marker and other small things to be used on projects. Going to bey another one for bigger cutting projects.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great Project Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do projects on outside such as wood cutting, cleaning the air conditioner, fixing lawn mower, etc. This works great for those projects. I like how sturdy the table is while still be light. Easy to assemble and with self leveling legs works great outdoors and indoors.
customer_reviews.author: N.J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. The clamps are a bit tricky to attach to the table but work fine when n place.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy portable table just right for making storage shed doors.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend for small places (garage ), it's not easy to disassemble .
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This makes the second table I got made by Keter and both are great tables
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Dover

customer_reviews.title: All around perfect, portable table.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and I love the portability! Sturdy, light weight. I found myself using this for more than just the table saw.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Gal

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy and the clamps that comes with it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding work station!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I've made all year! It is much sturdier than you expect, and legs are easily detached for storage purposes. Excellent price, I highly recommend this work table.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: looks and feels sturdy now to put it to work
customer_reviews.author: white tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: J. Winebarger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Quality. My best buy for building my guns. This is a sturdy bench that I can take anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jason samples

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to keep my chop saw off the floor. Super sturdy! Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: J Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can store it just about anywhere. It’s very sturdy. Clamps work great!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now or the Nazis win
customer_reviews.text: Seriously though, this table is excellently built and well-designed. If you need a portable, temporary workspace, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: JDoshair

customer_reviews.title: one flaw
customer_reviews.text: only thing that could make this better is if the legs folded, without having to flip it over, detach the legs to store the bench
customer_reviews.author: Dean Clerico

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: This work bench is nicer than I expected for the money. Very sturdy when assembled and lightweight and storable. Very light to carry. All in all, an outstanding portable work table.
customer_reviews.author: J.A. WADE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy and light!
customer_reviews.text: Just the perfect table to work my wood projects, sturdy yet ligt to carry, very convenient for storage once you done using.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Got someone else’s return
customer_reviews.text: My table came today in a box that had been opened before. I was sent someone’s return. The tool box and clamps were missing. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome work table
customer_reviews.text: This work table is light but sturdy and has proven to be my go to platform for all of my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent! Might buy another one. For a friend of mine for Christmas! Thanks again Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it!! Nothing is bad about it it’s a great investment. Is Welbilt!Easy to assemble it is well worth the money! Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD R Groves

customer_reviews.title: Worktable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my work table and it’s perfect for me and easy for me to handlr
customer_reviews.author: Lasandra

customer_reviews.title: Best portable work bench
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday is to assemble carry and store away I love it
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Green

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and fold, lightweight to carry. Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Spencer

customer_reviews.title: We use it when camping
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great table for holding our small pellet grill. We cover it with a table cloth, just so it doesn't get grease or food stains. Then when we're not camping, we can use it in the garage or wherever we need a sturdy table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table, came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table, does everything I need it to do. But it did come scratched and with one cracked foot. Still works fine but it is a cosmetic issue for a brand new item.
customer_reviews.author: santi

product_meta.title: KETER Jobmade Portable Work Bench and Miter Saw Table for Woodworking Tools and Accessories with Included Wood Clamps – Removable Table Legs for Easy Garage Storage
product_meta.description: Don't mistake the clamping table's lightweight design for something flimsy and unable to help with the job. It's extremely durable and can hold up to 1000 pounds. The handle makes it easy to carry the table to and from the job, and the storage compartment is ideal for keeping your tools and accessories together. Professionals need a quality workstation where they can start and finish their tasks. The Jobmade Clamping Table is designed for professionals who want a portable table that can hold heavy loads. When the job is done, simply fold the table flat, put your tools in the compartment and carry it to your truck with ease. Want to know some more benefits of the Jobmade Clamping Table? Check these out: Folded dimensions: 34. 65 in L x 21. 81 in. W x 4. 41 in. H Unfolded dimensions: 38. 19 in. L x 25. 39 in. W x 31. 89 in. H Tough enough to handle 1000 lbs. of load, yet lightweight enough to take it wherever you need to go It's made from durable resin, so it'll never rust, rot, peel or fade The table folds flat and is easy to carry thanks to the durable handle It comes with four holding clamps to assist with the job The storage compartment doubles as a tool organizer It has universal metal T-track rails for 2-inch bar clamps Work with confidence on slippery or uneven surfaces with built-in leg stabilizers Resilient, lightweight and portable means you can work just about anywhere Sturdy carrying handle
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: Folded: 34. 65 in L x 21. 81 in. W x 4. 41 in. H / Standing: 38. 19 in. L x 25. 39 in. W x 31. 89 in. H
RESIN CONSTRUCTION: Made of heavy-duty resin with aluminum legs and a work space capacity of 1000 lbs.
DURABLE AND STRONG: Weather-resistant polypropylene construction prevents rusting, peeling, and denting
LESS THAN 30 SECOND SETUP: Simply remove the legs from their designated storage space and pop them into the tabletop
LESS THAN 30 LBS: With its lightweight design and sturdy carrying handle, take your workbench just about anywhere
EASY STORAGE: Collapses down to 4.4 inches thick for easy storage in a pinch
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Includes four holding clamps to secure a variety of working materials as well as a removable tool organizer that clips into the table to always have on hand
DISCREET STORAGE BIN: It has a built-in storage compartment to keep all your tools on hand when you need them and neatly organized in one place
VERSATILE USE: Perfect for any kind of project – DIY projects, home improvement, commercial construction work, painting, table saw use, and more

specifications.Item model number: Jobmade Portable Work Bench and Miter
specifications.Included Components: 4 holding clamps, Accessory organizer, Work Bench
